channel.title: Server from private to public?
channel.description:
ok...i made this server and i can log into it through my ip..192.168.(#).(#) well anyways no one else can log in...i got a no-ip name i activated and stuff and i did portforwarding....any help?? :confused:
btw if you dont realize those last 2 #'s in my ip are my last 2 numbers which im hiding from you guys ^_^

item.title: Server from private to public?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Alright. Ill teach you I guess…

go to 192.168.1.1 ( type that in your address bar )

for name and pass they are both admin

Click Applications and Gaming

For application put anything you want, its the name.

For start and End ports put 43594

Set Protocol to Both

and for the Ip adress, go to Start > Control Panel > Network and Internet Connections > network connections

Click the one you are connecting to, for me it is Wireless Internet Connection.

Click support and the last 3 numbers of the ip, it will be something like 192.168.1.###

The ### goes in the box on the portforward screen

Last step, check the enable box. Save settings, done.

Thats is for Linksys.

Read full topic

@chassy13 wrote:

Portforward

Which means going into your router and allowing people to connect into your router.
